mapper.select:
select oi.id, oi.code, oi.user_id, oi.total_price, oi.`type`, oi.subsist_price, oi.owe_price, oi.status, oi.address_id, oi.create_date, oi.pay_date, oi.owe_date, ui.name as userName, ui.images, ai.address, ai.contact, ai.phone from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) left join address_info ai on (ai.id = oi.address_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.name},'%')
AND ai.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.address},'%')
AND ai.contact LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.contact},'%')
order by oi.create_date desc
